column5: I tried doing a search but didn't come up with anything.  So here's my question, does anyone know of any rivers around here that hold trout.  I know Depot creek near Powassan does, but I have never fished it.  Mike
Might have better luck trying to get info on back lakes. We used to get the stocking reports for that region from the MNR office but that was a few years ago.
Did you just call the regional office for them?
Actually dropped in to the old temagami office and when they closed it a number of years ago picked up a copy at Gravenhurst.

I have property just outside of North Bay and didn't think any of the lakes didn't have them.Every lake I have fished up there has them but any local tackle shop will tell you.Anywhere around south river and powassan will have lots of trout.good luck
Has anyone heard of them being in Ducheney Creek?
